definition: axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
axle/(fig.) central element/key element/axis (alliance of nations)
axis/principal axis (in mechanics, optics, botany etc)/main axle (of engine)
lit. to continuously revolve/to work non-stop/to work around the clock (idiom)

sentences.english: X axis and Y axis adopt ball spiral rods with excellent precisions and low friction factors.
sentences.chinese: 轴采用滚珠螺杆传动精度佳，摩擦系数小。

sentences.english: Surely applying a thin layer of antifriction when installing sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 在装轴套时，在轴上涂上一薄层减摩剂。

sentences.english: A single concrete tank required for Bio-Module shaft.
sentences.chinese: 生物模块轴需要一个单独的水泥池。

sentences.english: The rotating slip ring is insulated from the shaft by a laminated plastic bushing .
sentences.chinese: 旋转滑环是用片状塑料衬套与轴绝缘的。

sentences.english: What's more, our factorycan process and repair axletrees.
sentences.chinese: 另外，本厂还承接各种要求的轴芯加工和维修。

sentences.english: Adopts air swelling shaft roll furling roller, convenient for production.
sentences.chinese: 采用气涨轴收卷辊，方便生产。

sentences.english: Then their centers have been offset by 25 meters along the X axis.
sentences.chinese: 那么他们的中心是沿着X轴偏移了25米。

sentences.english: Add a retaining ring feature to the selected shaft section.
sentences.chinese: 将扣环特征加入至选取的轴剖面。

sentences.english: So, the Greenwich Meridian would be here, now, the one on the x axis.
sentences.chinese: 因此本初子午线应该在这里，也就是x轴。

sentences.english: The act of turning or winding or folding around a central axis .
sentences.chinese: 围绕一个中心轴翻或绕或叠的动作。

sentences.english: The ST420 is an analog-output shaft speed sensor.
sentences.chinese: ST420是一款模拟输出轴转速传感器。

sentences.english: Each axis travels on ball screw.
sentences.chinese: 每个轴行程的滚珠丝杆。

sentences.english: A shortcut route has been provided for working out the post-process program of parallel-link machine tools.
sentences.chinese: 为编制虚拟轴机床数控后处理程序提供一条捷径。

sentences.english: When it spins fast, its axis stays steady, stable.
sentences.chinese: 当它快速旋转式，它的轴就保持稳定。

sentences.english: The results suggested that Nujin Pill could regulate the function of pituitarium-ovary axis.
sentences.chinese: 提示女金丹对垂体卵巢轴具有兴奋和调整作用。

sentences.english: If you move in the y direction, it decreases at a constant rate.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在y轴的方向上移动，函数值将匀速地减少。

definition: axis/principal axis (in mechanics, optics, botany etc)/main axle (of engine)
axle/(fig.) central element/key element/axis (alliance of nations)
to move along one's course (of celestial bodies etc)/(fig.) to function/to be in operation/(of a train service etc) to operate/to run/(of a computer) to run
to rotate about an axis/axis of rotation (math.)
